plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Departure from Khulna and board the boat for a scenic ride towards the Sundarbans.

plans.heading: Arrive at the forest and check into the eco-friendly lodge. Lunch will be served on board.
Evening
plans.title: Guided nature walk and bird watching session. Dinner at the lodge.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Early morning boat safari through the creeks and canals. Breakfast on board.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Visit a local village to experience the culture and lifestyle of the forest dwellers. Lunch at the lodge.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Enjoy a night safari for a chance to see nocturnal wildlife. Dinner at the lodge.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Final boat safari with a focus on wildlife spotting. Breakfast on board.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Return journey to Khulna with lunch on board.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Arrive in Khulna and transfer to your next destination.

TourDetails.title: Explore Sundarbans
TourDetails.subTitle: Embark on a thrilling adventure to the Sundarbans, the largest mangrove forest in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage site. This tour offers a unique opportunity to explore the dense forests, winding rivers, and diverse wildlife that make the Sundarbans a natural wonder.
TourDetails.hl1D: Experience the excitement of spotting the majestic Royal Bengal Tiger, spotted deer, saltwater crocodiles, and a variety of bird species in their natural habitat.
TourDetails.hl2D: Navigate through the intricate network of rivers and creeks on a guided boat tour, providing an up-close view of the lush mangroves and the diverse ecosystem.
TourDetails.hl3D: Take guided walks through the forest trails to learn about the unique flora and fauna of the Sundarbans.
TourDetails.hl4D: Enjoy the thrill of a night safari to witness the nocturnal activities of the forest's inhabitants.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Arrive in Cox's Bazar and check into your beachfront hotel. Enjoy a welcome drink and relax.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Take a leisurely walk along the beach and explore the local shops and cafes. Lunch at a beachfront restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Enjoy a stunning sunset view from the beach. Dinner at the hotel.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Visit Himchari National Park for a nature walk and explore the waterfalls. Breakfast at the hotel.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Drive to Inani Beach for swimming and relaxation. Picnic lunch at the beach.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the hotel and enjoy a seafood dinner at a local restaurant.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Take a boat ride to nearby islands for snorkeling and marine exploration. Breakfast at the hotel.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Visit a local fishing village and interact with the fishermen. Lunch at the village.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the hotel for a farewell dinner and enjoy traditional music and dance.

TourDetails.title: Relax at Cox's Bazar
TourDetails.subTitle: Experience the ultimate beach getaway at Cox's Bazar, the world's longest natural sandy sea beach. This tour offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure, with pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and a vibrant local culture. Whether you're looking to unwind by the sea or explore the local attractions, Cox's Bazar has something for everyone.
TourDetails.hl1D: Spend your days lounging on the soft sands, soaking up the sun, and swimming in the warm waters of the Bay of Bengal.
TourDetails.hl2D: Take a scenic drive along the coastline, offering breathtaking views of the sea and surrounding hills.
TourDetails.hl3D: Visit this beautiful park known for its lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and panoramic views of the beach.
TourDetails.hl4D: Savor fresh seafood and local delicacies at beachfront restaurants and cafes.

gallery.title: A fishing boat waiting for the tide to sail.
gallery.subtitle: Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Start your day with a visit to Lalbagh Fort and Ahsan Manzil. Breakfast at a local caf√©.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Explore Old Dhaka, including the Sadarghat river port and street markets. Lunch at a traditional restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Visit the Star Mosque and Dhakeshwari Temple. Dinner at a renowned local eatery.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Tour the Liberation War Museum to learn about Bangladesh's independence. Breakfast at the hotel.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Visit the National Parliament House and enjoy nearby parks. Lunch at a contemporary restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Explore modern Dhaka with visits to shopping districts and cultural centers. Dinner at a rooftop restaurant with city views.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Visit the Armenian Church and other historical sites. Breakfast at the hotel.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Take a boat ride on the Buriganga River for a different perspective of the city. Lunch on the boat.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Conclude your tour with a cultural show featuring traditional music and dance. Farewell dinner at a local restaurant.

TourDetails.title: Dhaka City Tour
TourDetails.subTitle: Discover the vibrant heart of Bangladesh with our Dhaka City Tour. This tour offers a deep dive into the rich history, culture, and modern life of Dhaka, the bustling capital of Bangladesh. From historic landmarks to contemporary attractions, experience the essence of Dhaka in this comprehensive city tour.
TourDetails.hl1D: Visit iconic sites such as Lalbagh Fort, Ahsan Manzil (Pink Palace), and the Liberation War Museum to learn about the city's storied past.
TourDetails.hl2D: Explore the vibrant streets of Old Dhaka, visit the bustling Sadarghat river port, and enjoy the colorful markets and traditional craftsmanship.
TourDetails.hl3D: Discover the architectural beauty of the Star Mosque, Dhakeshwari Temple, and Armenian Church.
TourDetails.hl4D: Visit modern attractions like the National Parliament House, designed by the renowned architect Louis Kahn, and explore the city's parks and recreational areas.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Arrive in Bandarban and check into your hilltop resort. Enjoy a welcome drink.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Visit the Tribal Villages to learn about the local culture and traditions. Lunch at a local restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Enjoy a peaceful evening at the resort with stunning views of the hills. Dinner at the resort.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Start an early morning trek to Nilgiri, the highest accessible point in Bangladesh. Breakfast on the go.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Continue trekking to Chimbuk Hill and visit the local markets. Picnic lunch during the trek.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the resort and relax. Dinner with a view of the sunset.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Visit Nafakhum Waterfall, one of the largest waterfalls in Bangladesh. Breakfast at the resort.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Enjoy a boat ride on the Sangu River. Lunch on the boat.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to Bandarban for your departure. Farewell dinner at a local restaurant.

TourDetails.title: Hill Tracts Adventure
TourDetails.subTitle: Embark on an exhilarating adventure in the Hill Tracts of Bangladesh. Explore the rugged landscapes, visit tribal villages, and trek through some of the most beautiful scenery the country has to offer.
TourDetails.hl1D: Experience the thrill of trekking through hills and valleys, reaching breathtaking viewpoints and exploring remote areas.
TourDetails.hl2D: Learn about the unique cultures and traditions of the local tribes, with opportunities to visit their villages and interact with them.
TourDetails.hl3D: Discover the stunning waterfalls hidden within the hills, perfect for a refreshing dip or a scenic photo opportunity.
TourDetails.hl4D: Enjoy panoramic views of the Hill Tracts, with plenty of opportunities to relax and take in the natural beauty.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Arrive in Rajshahi and check into your hotel. Breakfast at the hotel.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Visit the Varendra Research Museum and Puthia Temple Complex. Lunch at a local restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Explore the historic city center and enjoy dinner at a traditional restaurant.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Visit the Bagha Mosque and Natore Rajbari. Breakfast at the hotel.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Explore the Barind Tract region and its archaeological sites. Picnic lunch during the exploration.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the hotel and enjoy a cultural show featuring traditional music and dance. Dinner at the hotel.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Enjoy a leisurely boat ride on the Padma River. Breakfast on the boat.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Visit the local silk factories and see the production process. Lunch at a local restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the hotel for your departure. Farewell dinner at a traditional restaurant.

TourDetails.title: Historical Rajshahi
TourDetails.subTitle: Discover the rich history and cultural heritage of Rajshahi, known for its ancient temples, mosques, and archaeological sites. This tour offers an in-depth exploration of the region's historical landmarks and vibrant cultural traditions.
TourDetails.hl1D: Visit significant historical sites such as the Varendra Research Museum, Puthia Temple Complex, and Bagha Mosque.
TourDetails.hl2D: Experience the local culture through visits to traditional markets, cultural shows, and interactions with local artisans.
TourDetails.hl3D: Enjoy a relaxing boat ride on the Padma River, taking in the scenic beauty and serene environment.
TourDetails.hl4D: Explore the local silk industry and learn about the traditional silk production process in Rajshahi.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Arrive in Sylhet and check into your tea estate bungalow. Breakfast at the bungalow.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Explore the lush tea gardens and learn about the tea-making process. Lunch at the estate.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Enjoy a relaxing evening with a tea tasting session. Dinner at the bungalow.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Visit the Ratargul Swamp Forest for a boat tour. Breakfast at the bungalow.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Explore the Jaflong region and see the beautiful stone collections. Picnic lunch during the tour.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the estate and enjoy a cultural show featuring local music and dance. Dinner at the bungalow.

plans.heading: Morning
plans.title: Visit the Hazrat Shah Jalal Mazar Sharif and Hazrat Shah Paran Mazar Sharif. Breakfast at the bungalow.

plans.heading: Afternoon
plans.title: Explore the local markets and enjoy a traditional lunch at a local restaurant.

plans.heading: Evening
plans.title: Return to the bungalow for your departure. Farewell dinner at the estate.

TourDetails.title: Tea Gardens of Sylhet
TourDetails.subTitle: Relax and unwind in the serene tea gardens of Sylhet. This tour offers a perfect blend of relaxation, cultural exploration, and natural beauty, providing a rejuvenating experience in one of Bangladesh's most picturesque regions.
TourDetails.hl1D: Discover the process of tea production and enjoy the peaceful environment of the tea estates.
TourDetails.hl2D: Explore the Ratargul Swamp Forest and Jaflong's stunning landscapes, offering a unique natural experience.
TourDetails.hl3D: Visit important heritage sites like Hazrat Shah Jalal and Hazrat Shah Paran Mazar Sharif to learn about the region's history and culture.
TourDetails.hl4D: Engage with local traditions and enjoy cultural shows, tea tastings, and visits to traditional markets.
